item.description:
Update! FREE (Wal-Mart or comparable) rain poncho!! (see message area below)

Sunday 6/21/2009 10AM is our next hike. Currently the weather is supposed to rain but based on how accurate they are we are still going to have the hike unless it is a monsoon!

Bear Hill Wildlife Management Area

We will park at the top of the hill either at the end of the road where there is a big asphalt circle or if the gate is open we can drive in and park in the parking lot.

The hike is fairly easy. There is a small stream and half of the hike is down hill the other half is of course back up. There are more trails then on the trail map.

I recommend waterproofing your shoes because some of the hiking is on narrow grass paths that I ended up soaked from because the grass is pretty high on the sides and covered the path.

Geocache:
There is a geocache on the site also we can try and find
http://www.geocaching...



Directions: 170 Bear Hill Rd. Bozrah, CT 06334
http://maps.google.co...

Trail Map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there in the Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Bear Hill Wildlife Management Area
